### \title and \author

\documentclass{article}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
%\begin{document}
%\title{xyz}
\title{Hello}
\author{John Doe}
\date{December 9th, 2024}
\begin{document}
\maketitle
Hello, world!
\end{document}

---

\documentclass{article}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
%\begin{document}
%\title{xyz}
\begin{document}
\title{<s>Uryyb</s>}
\author{<s>Wbua Qbr</s>}
\date{<s>Qrprzore 9gu, 2024</s>}
\maketitle
<s>Uryyb, jbeyq!</s>
\end{document}

### \author and \thanks

\documentclass{article}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\author{John Doe\thanks{Mom}}
\begin{document}
\maketitle
Hello, world!
\end{document}

---

\documentclass{article}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\begin{document}
\author{<s>Wbua Qbr</s>\thanks{<s>Zbz</s>}}
\maketitle
<s>Uryyb, jbeyq!</s>
\end{document}
